name: jsonml2html
description: Microlibrary that converts jsonml into html strings
author: Rasmus Erik Voel Jensen (solsort.com)

scripts.prepublish: reputil build; uglifyjs -m -c warnings=false -d isNodeJs=false,runTest=false jsonml2html.js > jsonml2html.min.js; git add jsonml2html.min.js README.md
